title: Demon Sex: The Tale of A Demon Sex Slave
description: Elise only wanted to enjoy her life as a new college student, only to find out that certain demonic creatures have special plans for her, too. Her nightmares have began...Elise moved to the city to attend college. She got a new apartment, has met new friends, has flirted with new guys and most of all, was studying really hard. She thought stress was the catalyst to the dreams. She did not even recall them at first, but she worried about body pains, torn garments, and ugly bruises when she woke up in the mornings.Then she started remembering the horrible, painful nightmares! They weren't even ordinary monsters. They were demons that would rape her over and over. Was she going crazy? But that's just impossible! Impossible to believe that the nightmares were actually happening...READER ADVISORY: This story contains content that some readers may find objectionable. This includes sex, extended orgasms, and erotic themes. All of the characters are 18 years of age or older.
author: Sandra Ross
